#summary Image URL Transloading
#labels Featured,Phase-Implementation

=Image URL Transloading=

The image URL transloading API allows you to instantly move an image from one web host to another.

==Details==

*URL:* http://imgur.com/api/upload/

*Method:* GET (HTTP)

==Parameters==

    * 'url' - A URL to an image.
    * 'edit' - Whether or not to edit the image before uploading.

==Implementation==

Just point your browser to this URL http://imgur.com/api/upload/?url=URL_HERE with the URL you wish to transload. Alternatively, you can point your browser to http://imgur.com/api/upload/?edit&url=URL_HERE if you wish to edit the image first.

==Sample Code==

*HTML Link*
{{{
<a href="http://imgur.com/api/upload/?url=http://example.com/image.jpg">Transload Image</a>
}}}
{{{
<a href="http://imgur.com/api/upload/?edit&url=http://example.com/image.jpg">Transload and Edit Image</a>
}}}

*cURL*
{{{
curl "http://imgur.com/api/upload/?url=http://example.com/image.jpg"
}}}
{{{
curl "http://imgur.com/api/upload/?edit&url=http://example.com/image.jpg"
}}}

*PHP*
{{{
header("Location: http://imgur.com/api/upload/?url=http://example.com/image.jpg");
}}}
{{{
header("Location: http://imgur.com/api/upload/?edit&url=http://example.com/image.jpg");
}}}
